Title: Animal Welfare Official Control Delivery
Objective: To assess the effectiveness of the FSA official controls for animal welfare in achieving the objectives of EU law

Title: Raw Drinking Milk Follow-up (England & Wales)
Objective: To provide assurance to FSA management that agreed management actions to address issues highlighted for the original audit report issued in November 2018, FSA official controls for raw drinking milk sold direct for human consumption in England, Wales and N Ireland, have been effectively implemented to address the issue.
